talentList.name: Call of Flame
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Call of Thunder
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Concussion
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Convection
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Fury
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

talentList.name: Improved Fire Totems
talentList.description: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by v0 sec. and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by v1%.

talentList.name: Earth's Grasp
talentList.description: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by v0% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by v1%.

talentList.name: Elemental Mastery
talentList.description: When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance and reduces the mana cost by 100%.

talentList.name: Elemental Focus
talentList.description: After landing a critical strike with a Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell, you enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next 2 damage spells by 40%.

talentList.name: Reverberation
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Lightning Mastery
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Elemental Warding
talentList.description: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Storm Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by v0 yards.

talentList.name: Eye of the Storm
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time on Shaman spells when taking damage.

talentList.name: Elemental Devastation
talentList.description: Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by v0% for 10 sec.

talentList.name: Unrelenting Storm
talentList.description: Regenerate mana equal to v0% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

talentList.name: Elemental Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by v0% and reduces the threat caused by Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Elemental Shields
talentList.description: Reduces the chance you will be critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Lightning Overload
talentList.description: Gives your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells a v0% chance to cast a second, similar spell on the same target at no additional cost that causes half damage and no threat.

talentList.name: Totem of Wrath
talentList.description: Summons a Totem of Wrath with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases the chance to hit and critically hit with spells by 3% to all party members if they are within 20 yards. Lasts 2 min.

talentList.name: Anticipation
talentList.description: Increases your chance to dodge by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by v0% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

talentList.name: Improved Ghost Wolf
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Lightning Shield
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by v0%.

talentList.name: Guardian Totems
talentList.description: Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by v0% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Enhancing Totems
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Weapons
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon by v0%, your Windfury Weapon effect by v1% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by v2%.

talentList.name: Shield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by v0% and increases the amount blocked by v1%.

talentList.name: Thundering Strikes
talentList.description: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Ancestral Knowledge
talentList.description: Increases your maximum Mana by v0%.

talentList.name: Toughness
talentList.description: Increases your armor value from items by v0% and reduces the duration of movement slowing effects on you v1%.

talentList.name: Spirit Weapons
talentList.description: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks and reduces the threat generated by your melee attacks by 30%.

talentList.name: Shamanistic Focus
talentList.description: After landing a Melee Critical Strike, you enter a Focused state. The Focused state reduces the mana cost of your next Shock spell by 60%.

talentList.name: Stormstrike
talentList.description: Instantly attack with both weapons. In addition, the next 2 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target are increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

talentList.name: Weapon Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Weapon Totems
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by v0% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Totem by v1%.

talentList.name: Mental Quickness
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by v0% and increses your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to v1% of you Attack Power

talentList.name: Dual Wield
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit while dual wielding by an additional 2%.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit while dual wielding by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Unleashed Rage
talentList.description: Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase all party members' attack power by v0% if within 20 yards of the Shaman. Lasts 10 sec.

talentList.name: Shamanistic Rage
talentList.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and gives your successful melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana equal to 30% of your attack power. Lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Ancestral Healing
talentList.description: Increases your target's armor value by v0% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

talentList.name: Totemic Mastery
talentList.description: The radius of your totems that affect friendly targets is increased to 30 yards.

talentList.name: Nature's Guidance
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by v0%

talentList.name: Improved Healing Wave
talentList.description: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Healing Focus
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Shaman healing spell.

talentList.name: Restorative Totems
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Reincarnation
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by v0 min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Mana Tide Totem
talentList.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 30 yards.

talentList.name: Nature's Swiftness
talentList.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less then 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

talentList.name: Purification
talentList.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Tidal Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Tidal Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Totemic Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Healing Grace
talentList.description: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by v0% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by v1%.

talentList.name: Healing Way
talentList.description: Your Healing Wave spells have a v0% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec. This effect will stack up to 3 times.

talentList.name: Focused Mind
talentList.description: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the Shaman by v0%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

talentList.name: Nature's Guardian
talentList.description: Whenever a damaging attack is taken that reduces you below 30% health, you have a v0% chance to heal 10% of your total health and reduce your threat level on that target. 5 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Nature's Blessing
talentList.description: Increases your spell damage and healing by an amount equal to v0% of your Intellect.

talentList.name: Improved Chain Heal
talentList.description: Increases the amount healed by your Chain Heal spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Earth Shield
talentList.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, giving a 30% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 150. This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 10 min. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at o time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.
